item.description:
jesse1994:

If it is made, it should be it’s own game, not a extension to synergy. That would also allow it to possibly make more black mesa maps

Coop already works, you just add some things to the listenserver.cfg in the BMS/CFG directory make it execute that on game launch , download a player model for everyone to use then start up a map and BAM…someone can then connect through the console to your server using hamachi or tunngle, its practically that easy with any half life game

but of course, with random crashes every other map

item.title: Synergy/Multiplyer
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Wrong, wrong, and wrong.

  1. Wrong forum, you need to post this in the Synergy Team’s forum here.
  2. Wrong info, many mods have been added to Synergy without them being hosted on steam.
  3. It’s just plain wrong, Synergy Development has been in hibernation for years now.

There server documentation is outdated making it impossible to run a dedicated Synergy server with Half-Life campaigns.
And the tool to run a Synergy server in Steam crashes as soon as you launch it. =/
